Class JConsoleArea

java.lang.Object

              +--javax.swing.JComponent

                    +--javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
                          |
                          +--javax.swing.JTextArea
                                |
                                +--FESI.swinggui.JConsoleArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
Accessible, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Scrollable, Serializable
public class JConsoleArea
extends JTextArea

Implements a console with interactive input/output (in collaboration with Console). The stream I/O of Console should probably be moved here.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Inner Class Summary
static class JConsoleArea.CopyAction
          Copies the selected region and place its contents into the system clipboard.
static class JConsoleArea.CutAction
          Cuts the selected region and place its contents into the system clipboard.
static class JConsoleArea.DefaultKeyTypedAction
          The action that is executed by default if a key typed event is received and there is no keymap entry.
static class JConsoleArea.PasteAction
          Pastes the contents of the system clipboard at the end of the text area.
static class JConsoleArea.ReturnKeyTypedAction
          Action for RETURN - send text to console.
